description: Quality validation checklist for interactive tool brainstorming

checklistItems.title: Unique & Useful Results
checklistItems.description: Does this tool provide a unique and useful result to the user that is more than just a simple figure with no surrounding context to highlight its true value?
evaluationCriteria: Results include contextual insights beyond raw numbers
Provides benchmarking or comparative analysis
Offers actionable recommendations based on results
Delivers 'aha moments' that justify time investment
Results tell a story, not just present data

checklistItems.title: Service/Product/Value Demonstration
checklistItems.description: Does this tool effectively demonstrate or highlight a unique 'Service', 'Product', or 'Value' on behalf of the owner?
evaluationCriteria: Showcases domain expertise and knowledge
Positions tool owner as trusted advisor/expert
Creates natural opportunities for service upselling
Demonstrates unique methodology or approach
Builds credibility through sophisticated analysis

checklistItems.title: Comprehensive Visual Feedback
checklistItems.description: Does this tool thoroughly provide visual feedback through all of the steps?
evaluationCriteria: Progress indicators throughout multi-step process
Real-time calculation updates and previews
Visual charts, graphs, or infographics for results
Interactive elements that respond to user input
Clear visual hierarchy and information flow

checklistItems.title: Strategic Lead Information Collection
checklistItems.description: Does this tool collect the needed lead information before the user disengages?
evaluationCriteria: Clear value exchange for contact information
Optimal timing for lead capture (not too early/late)
Multiple touchpoints for engagement
Compelling incentive for information sharing
Low-friction capture process

excellent.description: Tool exceeds expectations in all areas

good.description: Tool meets quality standards and is ready for deployment

needsImprovement.description: Tool has potential but requires refinement
